nodes.text: Wil Jhonems was the marketing manager for the Spotts TradeChip Company on Coruscant in 22 BBY.

He defended the controversial Jedi TradeChips line to HoloNet News, stating that the Jedi were better role-models for children during the turbulent times of the Separatist Crisis than the professional athletes who appeared on most tradechips. He also tried to explain away the inaccurate information on the tradechips, pointing out that Spotts did the best they could without access to the Jedi Archives library, and that corrections could be made in the next set.
